{"type":"text","timestamp":1771660747625,"sessionID":"ses_380ca9be2ffe4NXuuTMzjmhwJJ","part":{"id":"prt_c7f358947001Y2Jin1IBPDFZvm","sessionID":"ses_380ca9be2ffe4NXuuTMzjmhwJJ","messageID":"msg_c7f3564800017qbkKtSx0BvfJt","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# Build stage
FROM maven:3.9-eclipse-temurin-21 AS builder
WORKDIR /app

# Copy Maven project files
COPY pom.xml .
COPY src ./src

# Build the JAR
RUN mvn clean package -DskipTests

# Runtime stage
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre-alpine AS runtime

# Install font packages for PDF/CJK support
RUN apk add --no-cache fontconfig ttf-dejavu

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup -g 1001 appgroup && \
    adduser -D -u 1001 -G appgroup appuser

# Set WORKDIR
WORKDIR /app

# Copy JAR from builder
COPY --from=builder /app/target/*.jar app.jar

# Import certificates at build time (stored in /app/certs/ as trusted.jks)
RUN keytool -importcert -trustcacerts -alias aws-rds-ca -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/aws-rds-root-ca.pem -keystore /app/certs/trusted.jks -storepass changeit -noprompt && \
    keytool -importcert -trustcacerts -alias azure-digicert -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/azure-digicert.pem -keystore /app/certs/trusted.jks -storepass changeit -noprompt

# Set env vars for truststore
ENV JAVA_OPTS="-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStore=/app/certs/trusted.jks -Djavax.net.ssl.trustStorePassword=changeit"

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1

# Run as non-root user
USER appuser

# Start the application
CMD ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"]
